cast.overview: Leonard Shelby is tracking down the man who raped and murdered his wife. The difficulty of locating his wife's killer, however, is compounded by the fact that he suffers from a rare, untreatable form of short-term memory loss. Although he can recall details of life before his accident, Leonard cannot remember what happened fifteen minutes ago, where he's going, or why.
cast.title: Memento

cast.original_title: The Map of Tiny Perfect Things
cast.overview: Two teenagers trapped in an endless time loop set out to find all the tiny things that make that one day perfect.
cast.title: The Map of Tiny Perfect Things

details.biography:
Jorja-An Fox (born July 7, 1968, in New York City, New York height 5' 8½" (1,74 m) ), is an American actress, musician and songwriter. She first came to prominence as a guest star on the television drama ER, portraying the recurring role of Dr. Maggie Doyle from 1996 to 1999. This was followed by another critical success in the recurring role of Secret Service Agent Gina Toscano on The West Wing in 2000.

She is arguably best known for her work as Sara Sidle in the hit CBS crime drama CSI: Crime Scene Investigation, a role she has portrayed as both a regular (2000–2007, 2011–) and recurring (2008–2011) cast member.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Jorja-An Fox , licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Jorja Fox
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
